original_text: For the rich men thereof are full of violence, and the inhabitants thereof have spoken lies, and their tongue is deceitful in their mouth.
korean_text: 그 부자들은 강포가 가득하였고 그 주민들은 거짓을 말하니 그 혀가 입에서 거짓되도다

sentences.original_text: For the rich men thereof are full of violence
and the inhabitants thereof have spoken lies
and their tongue is deceitful in their mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 혀는 입안에서 속이는 말을 한다
